scripts.test: npm run test-token && npm run test-native && npm run test-token-enterprise
scripts.test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-market-api* CHAINS=TOKEN TOKEN_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca TOKEN_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest api-common --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.test-token-enterprise: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN ENTERPRISE CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-market-api* FLAVOUR=enterprise CHAINS=TOKEN_ENTERPRISE TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xb80C02d24791fA92fA8983f15390274698A75D23 TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest api-enterprise --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-market-api* CHAINS=NATIVE NATIVE_CHAIN_ID=65535 NATIVE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca NATIVE_IS_NATIVE=true NATIVE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:18545 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest api-common --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.ci-test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && CHAINS=TOKEN TOKEN_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca TOKEN_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-token:8545 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis jest api-common --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.ci-test-token-enterprise: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN ENTERPRISE CHAIN' && FLAVOUR=enterprise CHAINS=TOKEN_ENTERPRISE TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xb80C02d24791fA92fA8983f15390274698A75D23 TOKEN_ENTERPRISE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-token:8545 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis jest api-common api-enterprise --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.ci-test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && CHAINS=NATIVE NATIVE_CHAIN_ID=65535 NATIVE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca NATIVE_IS_NATIVE=true NATIVE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-native:8545 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis jest api-common --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
